mapper.select: SELECT b.no , b.user_no AS userNo , u.name AS name , b.title , b.contents , b.count , b.file_name AS fileName , DATE_FORMAT(b.cre_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS creDate , DATE_FORMAT(b.mod_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS modDate , b.gubun FROM phh_board b JOIN phh_user u ON b.user_no = u.no WHERE b.gubun = 3 ORDER BY b.no DESC;

SELECT b.no , b.user_no AS userNo , u.name AS name , b.title , b.contents , b.count , b.file_name AS fileName , DATE_FORMAT(b.cre_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS creDate , DATE_FORMAT(b.mod_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS modDate , b.gubun , u.pass FROM phh_board b JOIN phh_user u ON b.user_no = u.no WHERE b.no = #{no};

SELECT c.reply_no AS replyNo , c.user_no AS userNo , u.name AS name , c.board_no AS boardNo , c.comment , c.parent_no AS parentNo , DATE_FORMAT(c.cre_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS creDate FROM phh_comments c JOIN phh_user u ON c.user_no = u.no JOIN phh_board b ON c.board_no = b.no WHERE b.no = #{no};

SELECT b.no , b.user_no AS userNo , u.name AS name , b.title , b.contents , b.count , b.file_name AS fileName , DATE_FORMAT(b.cre_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS creDate , DATE_FORMAT(b.mod_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS modDate , b.gubun FROM phh_board b JOIN phh_user u ON b.user_no = u.no WHERE b.gubun = 1 ORDER BY b.no DESC;
